name: XRSession.inputSources
description: The read-only inputSources property of the XRSession interface returns an XRInputSourceArray object which lists all controllers and input devices which are expressly associated with the XR device and are currently available.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The read-onlyinputSourcesproperty of the XRSession interface returns an XRInputSourceArray object which lists all controllersand input devices which are expressly associated with the XR device and are currently available. These controllersmay include handheld controllers, XR-equipped gloves,optically tracked hands, and gaze-based input methods. Keyboards, gamepads, and mice are not considered WebXR input sources.

Note:Traditional gamepad controllersare supported using theGamepad API.
